title: Bacon, pear and grape salad with curried cashews
ingredients: ['90g cashew nuts', '4 rashers streaky bacon', '1 tablespoon melted butter', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh rosemary', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '1 tablespoon dark brown soft sugar', '1/2 teaspoon sea salt', '1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper', 'Dressing', '3 tablespoons white wine vinegar', '3 tablespoons Dijon mustard', '2 tablespoons honey', '120ml olive oil', 'salt and black pepper to taste', 'Salad', '285g mixed salad greens', '1/2 medium pear, thinly sliced', '80g seedless red grapes, halved']
